snippet: Bruce David Martin wanted to return to Greenwich Village, but nothing he saw compared to his old apartment, which was on the market.
abstract: The Hunt column on the search by Bruce David Martin for one-bedroom home in Greenwich Village for under $900,000; ended up buying an apartment he had previously owned in the 1990s, on Greenwich Street, for $850,000.
lead_paragraph: Bruce David Martin wanted to return to Greenwich Village, but nothing he saw compared to his old apartment, which was on the market.

headline.print_headline: Can’t Get That Place Off My Mind
headline.seo: The Hunt - Can’t Get That Place Out of My Mind
headline.main: Can’t Get That Place Off My Mind
